entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:46 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
